00036 #pragma warning( disable: 4800 )
00037 #include <boost/archive/basic_binary_iarchive.hpp>
00038 #pragma warning( pop )
00039 #include <boost/archive/detail/register_archive.hpp>
00040 #include <boost/archive/shared_ptr_helper.hpp>

00052 namespace co
00053 {
00055 class DataIStreamArchive
00056     : public boost::archive::basic_binary_iarchive< DataIStreamArchive >
00057     , public boost::archive::detail::shared_ptr_helper
00058 {
00059     typedef boost::archive::basic_binary_iarchive< DataIStreamArchive > Super;
00060 
00061 public:
00063     CO_API DataIStreamArchive( DataIStream& stream );
00064 
00066     CO_API void load_binary( void* data, std::size_t size );
00067 
00069     template< typename T >
00070     void load_array( boost::serialization::array< T >& a, unsigned int );
00071 
00073     struct use_array_optimization
00074     {
00075         template< class T >
00076         struct apply
00077             : public boost::serialization::is_bitwise_serializable< T > {};
00078     };
00079 
00080 private:
00081     friend class boost::archive::load_access;
00082 
00090     CO_API void load( bool& b );
00091 
00093     template< class C, class T, class A >
00094     void load( std::basic_string< C, T, A >& s );
00095 
00103     template< typename T >
00104     typename boost::enable_if< boost::is_integral<T> >::type load( T& t );
00105 
00133     template< typename T >
00134     typename boost::enable_if< boost::is_floating_point<T> >::type load( T& t );
00135 
00136 #if BOOST_VERSION >= 104400
00137     // in boost 1.44 version_type was splitted into library_version_type and
00138     // item_version_type, plus a whole bunch of additional strong typedefs
00139     CO_API void load( boost::archive::library_version_type& version );
00140     CO_API void load( boost::archive::class_id_type& class_id );
00141     CO_API void load( boost::serialization::item_version_type& version );
00142     CO_API void load( boost::serialization::collection_size_type& version );
00143     CO_API void load( boost::archive::object_id_type& object_id );
00144     CO_API void load( boost::archive::version_type& version );
00145 #endif
00146 
00147     CO_API signed char _loadSignedChar();
00148 
00149     DataIStream& _stream;
00150 };
